Topic.Title: Moody's got no choice, has to cut US credit rating.

Message.Msg: Quit reading Democrap talking points and take some classes in ECONOMICS, IDIOT!

Message.Title: yes it was Bushes fault
Message.Msg: From 2000 to 2008, under President Bush, Federal spending rose by $1.3 trillion, from $1.9 trillion a year to $3.2 trillion a year. From 2009 to 2011, meanwhile, under President Obama, federal spending has risen by $600 billion, from $3.2 trillion a year to $3.8 trillion a year. It has also now begun to decline. In other words, federal government spending under President Bush increased 2X as much as it has under President Obama. So, who's responsible for the explosion in federal spending?
LYING IDIOT!

You must have a different calendar. Mine didn't end with 2008. Nor did it start in 2002. Interesting how your perspective is limited to a few years. No bias there, huh. Oh, you were just proving a point? How? By showing only the data you wanted to show? Smacks of partisan hackjob. Disregarded.

Message.Title: this board is annoying
Message.Msg: does anyone talk about bac?? well ill start, im short bac for about 2 weeks now and im about break even, its frustrating but i could have covered at a small profit today but after watching the price action and how it closed flat when the markets were up nearly 1 percent tells me that its wants to reverse trend very soon. too much garbage holding up this market, people are talking about the economy recovering, but im gonna take a guess and say it has recovered, this is the new norm, high unemployment and economy addicted to stimulus, if and when they pull the plus on qe, there will be massive BKS as many companies are on life support. im currently short bac but most of my shorts are small and mid caps with negative eps , $anr $mpo ect..no qe and these companies go down the drain.. honestly i feel that you can throw a dart and pick a stock to short on qe winding down and it will win, they are going to call this the QE bubble in a few years and it will go down in the history books as a way NOT to stimulate jobs..i suspect they knew that all along, they looted the treasury and lined their pockets all in the name of job creation.

Message.Title: all this talk of tea party and liberal communists
Message.Msg: you should both accept the fact that you are both correct... the tea party is the worst, social conservatives truly are less intelligent but the fiscal policy of liberals is just dangerous. if you have children and see them living in america, you should be horrified at the direction of the country under obama..the libertarian party is truly the answer..they offer even more social freedoms than the dems, yet are even more fiscally responsible than the reps...lets face it, the dems are far from freedom lovers(anyone on foodstamps or welfare will tell you they are far from free) and the gop are far from small government/small spenders(although they would like you to think so) george bush spent and expanded governent nearly as much as obama..

Message.Title: LIBERTARIAN PARTY!
Message.Msg: americas last and only chance at becoming great again! both parties have betrayed america and more importantly our children. they have both proven incapable of guiding this nation back to prosperity. not only is raising the min wage a terrible idea, it needs to be abolished all together, with america no longer a manufacturing country, and with unions, min wage and gov regulation preventing us from even being a raw good supplier like the third world, its no wonder we are living on a credit card with a falling gdp. lack of manufacturing is not only the number one reason for our unemployment and low gdp, but its a national security issue as well, we won ww2 because we built our way to victory, now "made in the usa" is more a novelty, than anything. war on drugs and assault on our personal liberties will have us living in a broken police state if you dont already think we are in one now. american imperialism has inserted our influence in every global conflict at huge cost to american lives and tax payer dollars with nothing to show for it but more enemies. both parties are equally guilty of most if not all of these things and the only party that has a consistent track record of voting against the fed, high taxes,foreign wars, war on drugs and personal choice is the libertarian party, wake up people, bush destroyed the gop and got obama elected and in the next 4 years obamas big government will see to it that we are bankrupt and jobless and the only logical solution will be real change. if you are unfamiliar with the libertarian party is suggest you research, they appeal to both sides as they are socially liberal and fiscally conservation, they are the definition of what the founding fathers believed.

Topic.Title: Jesse Jackson Sr, tells us There is planty of room in Illinois Politics for his son
